1370: Niels moved to Helle voet.B.3 after marriage.
Got married to Saswe at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Saswe, Margareta, at age 25.
1371: Had a son with Saswe, Grote, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Saswe, Kerstine, at age 29.
Lost daughter Kerstine when Kerstine was 1 years old.
1375: Lost daughter Margareta when Margareta was 6 years old.
1379: Lost daughter Rabburgis when Rabburgis was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Saswe gave birth to their stillborn daughter Rabburgis in 1379.
1385: Had a son with Saswe, Iacobus, at age 40.
1386: Lost son Iacobus when Iacobus was 2 years old.
1389: Lost his wife Saswe while she was giving birth to Euerocker in 1389.
